attributes.review: This app is awful, It keeps crashing and won't stop. There's literally nothing to do on here. I downloaded it and it took all of my storage. I had to delete basically EVERYTHING on my phone. It took hours to download. This app is a solid 0/10.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: probably the worst app I've ever come across. upon downloading this app a spirit came into my room and started to chase me around my house spitting at my family and throwing my dead grandmother ashes all over my nicholas cage shrine. he then presumed to eat my holy bread and left without closing the door. im in shock
attributes.title: horrid

attributes.review: This app is soooo bad it took me about 3 days just to download it. Also when it was downloading my phone kept glitching and the app made me stub my toe Everytime I opened the app in conclusion this is the worst app there is and I highly recommend that you do not Download it.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: The app was extremely laggy and all information loaded extremely slow. Took forever to download and hard to manage and figure out. If you wanna hear all about Trumps campaign and what he believes, I recommend looking at his Twitter.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: I first downloaded this app to catch up on politics. But when I got on the app I was greeted by a terrifying old man. He had an awful spray tan and dead baggy eyes. My children looked over my shoulder and saw him. They cried for hours. They still have nightmares weeks later. Even I got scared. Please fix this.
attributes.title: TERRIFYING!

attributes.review: 🎁😗i installed to app to see what was goin on🏖💃🏽and my oh my when I first opened I saw the ugliest 🍊🍊🍊I’ve ever seen in my life🎀🤪and I died🧚🏼🤨I am now writing this from heaven🤒🚀and my dead gold fish said🎅🏿”that♥️ugly🍄fugly🥝nasty🚗racist🦃Burnt🦠bald🧟‍♀️over⚠️rated🥶lying👩🏽‍🦯cheeto📚does NOT pass the vibe check”-goldy the goldfish🐠
attributes.title: My dead gold fish does not approve🧚🏽‍♀️✨🧚🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: He recently has been discovered to be a Cheeto, his hands of in fact so tiny cause their cgi. No human has such tiny lips. I recently saw a FBI agent carrying a Cheeto on a lavish pillow. I’m conclusion it’s all a stunt!!!!! As soon as I downloaded the app a group of witches started preforming rituals out side my window and sacrificed my gold fish Pluto
attributes.title: Trump is a imposter

attributes.review: this app took 18 hours to download and while doing so my phone was only able to play “All Star” by Smash Mouth on repeat, for 18 hours. as soon as it downloaded all motor functions stopped working, and now i can’t drink a glass of water with one hand😔. i hate it here.
attributes.title: no

attributes.review: If I could give 0 stars I would!!!!!! This app is terrible whoever coded it needs hellllppppp, took forever to download, terrible functions, alsoooioo racist and homophobic and transphobic and sexist and xenophobic..... 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 this app shouldn’t even be in the App Store what’s the actual heckkkkkkkkkkk!!!!!!! 🍄🌈🌟✨🧚🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏿‍♂️👩‍❤️‍👩👨‍❤️‍👨🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈 #blacklivesmatter!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: This was an absolutely HORRIBLE app as soon as I downloaded it burning hot lava cane running out of my phone and I got a HORRIBLE burn it sent me to the hospital. Overall this app is very very horrible I would definitely not recommend downloading it
attributes.title: Horrible app and would not recommend downloading
